attributes.action: Stop BT charging reconnection charges of £125 for families struggling to pay in credit crunch!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People moving home are being charged a £125 reconnection fee by BT and taking advantage of consumer confusion, and its dominant position, by applying the same charge randomly to thousands of customers moving house.
BT is a giant and it's Profit/loss,balance sheet says it is adding loads of money to thier account ,when poor families are struggling even to pay the basic household bills.This is a ripoff,Could I request Mr. PM to look into this and provide a relief to UK public from monopolistic BT.
